title: Issue includes whom
context: §532-1 Issue includes whom. The word &ldquo;issue,&rdquo; as used in this chapter, includes all the lawful lineal descendants of the ancestor. [CC 1859, §1462; RL 1925, §3304; RL 1935, §4812; RL 1945, §12072; RL 1955, §318-1; HRS §532-1] Case Notes Includes adopted child. 26 H. 439. &ldquo;Issue&rdquo; as used in will includes adopted child. 35 H. 104, aff&rsquo;d 115 F.2d 956; 42 H. 640; 49 H. 273, 414 P.2d 925; see also 42 H. 129. Does not include illegitimate child. 20 H. 722. &ldquo;Issue by me begotten&rdquo; does not include grandchildren. 29 H. 278. &ldquo;Keiki&rdquo; construed as descendant of any generation, according to the context. 47 H. 610, 393 P.2d 753.
